      • getDataSource

        protected abstract javax.sql.DataSource getDataSource()
                                               throws ConnectorException
        Returns a DataSource for this type of Connector. If this database is creatable (ConnectorisDatabaseCreatable() is true, getDataSource should attempt to create it
        Returns:
        a DataSource for this Connector
        Throws:
        ConnectorException

      • isDatabaseCreatable

        protected abstract boolean isDatabaseCreatable()
        Checks to see if the configured database is yet to be created. This only applies to lightweight databases like SQLite which can create new databases on the fly.
        Returns:
        true if the database can, but has yet to be, created, false otherwise
